org.cucumber.tt

Class SimpleTrainSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cucumber.tt.SimpleTrainSort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.cucumber.tt.TrainSort

    public class SimpleTrainSort
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.cucumber.tt.TrainSort
    Simple sorting algorithm for sorting cars in a train using only 3 train tracks. Rules: - Stacks are used to represent the railroads. - You can only add cars in input track. - No duplicate IDs. - IDs only range from 0 to 9. - Cars can use any track to push the car in.
    Author:
    nlopez
